translation.en: ♪ How, what, where, why? ♪ ♪ What, where, why? How, what, where, why? ♪
♪ What, where, why? Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.es: ¿Cómo, cuándo y por qué? Ada Magnífica, científica,

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What the answer is ♪
♪ Under here, over there ♪
translation.es: Y busca aquí o busca allá,

translation.en: ♪ Science is everywhere you look ♪
♪ With Iggy Peck, architect ♪
♪ And Rosie Revere, engineer ♪
♪ So much to do ♪
♪ And you can help too! ♪
♪ A mystery, a riddle A puzzle, or a quest ♪ ♪ There are wonders to discover And hypotheses to test ♪
translation.es: Misterios, acertijos, enigmas o algo más.Probaremos la hipótesis, ya verás.

translation.en: ♪ Science is the best! Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.es: ¡La ciencia lo dirá! Ada Magnífica, científica,encuentra las respuestas específicas.

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What thе answer is ♪
translation.es: Ada Magnífica, científica,encuentra las respuestas específicas.

translation.en: ♪ Everywherе science is She's forming a hypothesis ♪
translation.es: La ciencia verá en todo lugar. Su hipótesis probará,los puntos unirá, científica magnífica.

translation.en: ♪ Connecting polka dots 'Cause this is scientist, Ada Twist! ♪
translation.es: Su hipótesis probará,los puntos unirá, científica magnífica. ADA MAGNÍFICA,CIENTÍFICA

translation.en: Ladybug's got eyes on the new neighbors' house.
translation.es: Mariquita vigila a los nuevos vecinos.

translation.en: A turntable? So, they like music.
Dragon, Whale Shark, any intel? Over.
[squeals] I think your new neighbors are unicorns!
-Over. -[Iggy] Huh?
Ah! Their evil bot dog's trying to take over the world! Over.
translation.es: ¡Su perro robot amenaza al mundo! Cambio.

translation.en: Gotcha! Iggy, what's up? You're scooting like you've seen a ghost.
Not at ghost, a p-p-p-puppy!
A puppy? Kids…
C'mon, crew. Let's go say hi to the new neighbors.
translation.es: Vamos a saludar a los vecinos.

translation.en: We're bringing my famous peppermint cookies to welcome them to the neighborhood.
translation.es: Hice mis famosas galletaspara darles la bienvenida.

translation.en: -That's okay, I'll stay here. -What about our investigation?
Don't you wanna know if they are evil unicorn bots who love music?
translation.es: ¿No quieres saber si son unicornios robotsque adoran la música?

translation.en: Fine, I'll come. For science.
-[barking] -[Iggy] Oh, no!
-[Rosie] Watch out! -[Arthur yells]
-Come on, boo. -I gotcha, buddy.
Sorry I doubted you, Iggy. That puppy is fierce!
translation.es: Perdón por haber dudado de ti. Es feroz.

translation.en: -It's okay. -[boy] Calypso!
-Heel mode, activate. -[watch beeps]
Sorry about that. He's usually friendly. -[all gasp] -Huh?
-There must be a glitch in his code. -[man] Don't worry, he doesn't bite.
translation.es: - Debe haber una falla.- Descuiden, no muerde.

translation.en: -Unless my son programmed him to. -[kids giggle]
translation.es: A menos que eso haya programado.

translation.en: How you doing? I'm Beck. -This is Benny and Bee-Bee. -Hello.
translation.es: - Hola. Somos Beck, Benny y Bee Bee.- Hola.

translation.en: We're the Twists. Aisha, Amari, Ada and Arthur.
translation.es: Somos Aisha, Amari,Ada, y Arturo Magnífica.

translation.en: And this is Iggy and Rosie.
-Hey. -Hey, how you doing?
Miss Sugarpie loves cookies! [chuckles] Well, good thing we have some right here.
translation.es: - La señorita Azúcar adora las galletas.- Por suerte hay aquí dentro.

translation.en: -Welcome to the neighborhood. -Thank you!
Bee-Bee, do we shake down our guests for cookies?
No, Glammy.
You can't knock the hustle, though, right?
-[laughing] -You know that's right.
I'm Grandma, or as I prefer, Glam-Ma.
Come, sit, tell me everything about this lovely town.
translation.es: Pasen y cuéntenme todode este hermoso pueblo.

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -[yelps] Oh, man! Really?!
-Gotta fix that code! -[calypso barking]
Wait for me! -Whoa! [sighs] -[barking]
[sighs] Okay, I fixed the code.
Calypso, sit. Stay… Good bot.
-He's cute, right? -[giggles]
-Benny made him. -Yep.
-From recycled materials. -Fab!
translation.es: - Lo creó Benny.- Con reciclaje. - Genial.- Vaya.

translation.en: -Wow! -Love that!
It's cool, right? I was born without a hand, but I get to have this awesome one!
translation.es: ¿No es genial? Nací sin una mano,pero tengo esta increíble.

translation.en: Miss Sugarpie picked the color.
-Awesome! -Amazing!
Nice turntable. My dad has one.
-Is this a control panel? -Ooh! For a spaceship?
-That's Benny's DJ controller. -DJ?
Dance party! Come on!
translation.es: - Es su consola de DJ.- ¿DJ? ¡A bailar! ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Thanks. Maybe… uh… another time?
[giggles] Comet Quest? Best TV show on the planet! Doctor Galactic is a boss!
translation.es: ¿En busca del cometa?Adoro esa serie. Dr. Galáctico es genial.

translation.en: "We don't rest until we quest!"
[gasps] I have an idea. You should watch it with us this weekend, Benny.
translation.es: ¡Ya sé! Veámosla juntos el fin de semana.

translation.en: -Um… I don't know. -[Arthur] Who's this?
Anyone ever tell you guys? You're really nosy.
-More like curious. -Totally.
That's my cousin, Dre. Watching Comet Quest is our thing.
translation.es: Es mi primo Dre. Siempre la vemos juntos.

translation.en: 'Til we moved here.
translation.es: Bueno, la veíamos juntosantes de mudarme aquí.

translation.en: I have an observation. I think you're homesick.
I do miss home a lot. But we're not going back.
translation.es: Extraño mucho mi casa,pero no regresaremos.

translation.en: Maybe we can help. We're scientists.
-Yeah. -We figure stuff out.
Kids. Your dads are having a debate about which instrument is the funkiest.
translation.es: Sus padres debatenqué instrumento es mejor.

translation.en: They'll be a while. You coming home with me?
Can Benny come home and brainstorm with us?
translation.es: ¿Benny puede venirpor una lluvia de ideas?

translation.en: If it's okay with his dad, sure.
-Bee-Bee, sweetie, your Glammy wants you. -Okay. Bye!
translation.es: Bee Bee, A-brilla te busca. Bueno. ¡Adiós!

translation.en: -Later! -Bye!
Come on, man, the bass is the backbone.
Let's brainstorm about how to get Benny back home.
translation.es: Hagamos una lluvia de ideaspara que vaya a casa.

translation.en: Say what?
♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
♪ Throw in every thought you've had No idea is ever bad ♪
translation.es: Lo que pienses lo dirás,luego escucharás.

translation.en: -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪ -♪ Gather up your friends, try ♪
translation.es: ¡Lluvia de ideas! Con ustedes pensaré el cómo y el porqué.

translation.en: -♪ To find the how ♪ -♪ The what ♪
translation.es: Con ustedes pensaré el cómo y el porqué.

translation.en: -♪ The why ♪ -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
♪ Let our imaginations Become great new creations ♪
translation.es: Deja que tu mentetome un rumbo diferente.

translation.en: ♪ When we brainstorm, brainstorm! Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
translation.es: Una lluvia de ideas. ¡Lluvia de ideas!

translation.en: ♪ Hey! ♪
We could hook Benny up to a jetpack. He'd get home in no time.
But I think they take a lot of practice to control.
translation.es: No son nada fáciles de controlar.

translation.en: What if we made the fastest underground train to take you super fast?
translation.es: Si construimos el metro más veloz,llegarás rápido.

translation.en: -[Ada] Let's go! -[Benny] Whoa!
The permits we'd have to get to tunnel through all the gopher cities down there? Ugh! Nightmare!
translation.es: El papeleo para atravesarla ciudad topo sería una pesadilla.

translation.en: -Right. Who wants to deal with that? -Ooh! An idea's downloading.
translation.es: Cierto. Qué molesto. Estoy descargando una idea.

translation.en: What if we make a bot that can run as fast as the fastest man alive?
translation.es: Hagamos un robotque supere incluso al hombre más veloz.

translation.en: He can take me home and get me back here before my family misses me.
translation.es: Podría llevarme y traermeantes de que me extrañen.

translation.en: That would be freaky, and amazing! But what if the bot won't stop?
translation.es: ¡Sería raro e increíble! Pero ¿y si el robot no se detiene?

translation.en: Yeah, that would be insane in the mainframe.
Ugh! I wish I could just snap my fingers and beam you home like Doctor Galactic would.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera teletransportarte a casacomo el Dr. Galáctico.

translation.en: That's it! I'll make a teleportation device like Doctor Galactic's in Comet Quest!
translation.es: ¡Sí! Fabricaré un teletransportadorcomo el de la serie.

translation.en: -That would be space-tastic! -I don't know.
Scientists haven't figured out teleportation yet.
Isn't that more like science fiction than actual science?
Lots of things were sci-fi before they were science. Cell phones, space stations,
translation.es: Muchas cosas científicas empezaron así:celulares, estaciones espaciales,

translation.en: -robot puppies. -[barking]
-You're right. -True.
If you wanna change stuff, you gotta think big! And I have to try, or I'm never going home again.
translation.es: Hay que pensar en grande para avanzar.Debo probar o no regresaré a casa.

translation.en: You're right. Scientists try impossible stuff all the time.
translation.es: Es cierto.Los científicos prueban cosas imposibles.

translation.en: -They do. -Yeah.
Okay. My gears are turning. Since Comet Quest is my jam,
translation.es: Tengo una idea. Como amo esa serie,investigué mucho de teletransportación.

translation.en: I've done a lot of research on teleportation.
translation.es: Como amo esa serie,investigué mucho de teletransportación.

translation.en: I think I know how to do it.
You have a hypothesis?
A hypothe-what now?
-[laughing] -♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
-♪ Does that… ♪ -♪ Observation ♪
-♪ Mean this… ♪ - ♪Explanation? ♪
♪ Right or wrong Let's find out what the answer is ♪
translation.es: La respuesta pronto vamos a encontrar.

translation.en: ♪ It might not be right But we're gonna find out ♪ ♪ What this theory is all about ♪
translation.es: Aunque esté en un error, voy a investigarsi esta teoría nos puede ayudar.

translation.en: ♪ An educated guess ♪
-♪ Will it stand up to our test? ♪ -♪ That's what a hypothesis is ♪
translation.es: - Una deducción.- ¿Y la explicación? Sí, eso es una hipótesis.

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ Let's find out how right it is ♪
♪ Let's go! ♪
To teleport, you have to travel faster than the speed of light.
translation.es: Hay que viajar más rápido que la luz.

translation.en: So, my hypothesis is, if I can do that, I can beam myself home.
translation.es: Mi hipótesis es que,si podemos hacerlo, podré ir a casa.

translation.en: But no one's traveled faster than the speed of light.
translation.es: Pero nadie superó la velocidad de la luz.

translation.en: Yet. But maybe we could if we made a Beaming Booth,
translation.es: Sí, pero quizá podamoscon un teletransportador

translation.en: like Doctor Galactic's teleportation machine.
-That's true. -Let's do it!
Loading the lab…
This is bomb-dot-com! Hold the smartphone!
translation.es: ¡Esto es increíble.com! ¡Espera! ¿Tienes una garra?¿Y un simulador de autos?

translation.en: You have a claw machine? And a driving simulation machine? And…
translation.es: ¡Espera! ¿Tienes una garra?¿Y un simulador de autos? ¿Y un túnel de viento?

translation.en: [voice echos] …and a wind tunnel?!
-[laughing] -Now I'm being really nosy.
You're gonna fit right in, Benny.
Especially with this.
Wow! This looks like it was made just for me.
Aw! Thank you.
You're welcome. Now, let's get to work.
-I could design the Beaming Booth. -And I could build it.
Only problem is, Doctor Galactic used supplies from seven different planets.
translation.es: Pero el Dr. Galáctico usa elementosde siete planetas diferentes.

translation.en: Since we have to stay on Earth, we can see what's in my garage.
translation.es: Tendremos que usarlo que haya en mi garaje.

translation.en: -[kids giggle] -But the keys add the magic.
The bass keeps your feet tapping.
Ta-da!
I programmed it using the speed of the world's fastest animals.
translation.es: Usé la velocidadde los animales más rápidos:

translation.en: The peregrine falcon, cheetah, and black marlin.
translation.es: el halcón, la chita y el marlín.

translation.en: With all that speed, this is definitely gonna work.
Thanks for helping me, guys. I'm going home to see Dre. Benny B. out!
translation.es: Gracias por ayudarme.Iré a casa a ver a Dre. ¡Adiós!

translation.en: Wait. We should test it first to make sure it's safe.
Oh, yeah, you're right. Benny B. in.
I guess I could sacrifice my egg salad sandwich… for science.
translation.es: Podría sacrificar mi sándwichpor la ciencia.

translation.en: That'll work.
Hit it, Benny!
-[Benny] It worked! -Mind blown!
-[giggles] -Guys, I don't think it did. Look.
-Bummer. -Phooey.
Things don't always work out on the first try.
translation.es: A veces falla la primera vez.

translation.en: But you programmed it with so much speed. We can brainstorm new ideas.
translation.es: Pero lo hiciste muy veloz.Hagamos otra lluvia de ideas.

translation.en: No, this has to work. What travels faster than the speed of light?
translation.es: No, funcionará.¿Qué es más veloz que la luz?

translation.en: Think, Benny, think!
Ooh! Maybe sound!
-I'm not sure if that's true. -It's gonna work. It just has to.
translation.es: Creo que no. Funcionará. Debe funcionar.

translation.en: -Okay… -Let's fire it up!
-[sighs] -It's okay, Benny. Even the best scientists in the world haven't cracked the teleportation code.
translation.es: Descuida. Ni los mejores científicosdecodificaron la teletransportación.

translation.en: Code! I just need the right code!
-[Rosie] Yikes! -[Ada] Oh, no!
-[Ada gasps] -I'm so sorry!
You tried to help, let me use your lab and everything,
translation.es: Intentaron ayudar,me dieron el laboratorio y corté la luz.

translation.en: and I knocked out the power. And I'm still not going back home.
translation.es: Intentaron ayudar,me dieron el laboratorio y corté la luz. Y no podré volver a casa.

translation.en: -Sorry, Benny. -[barks]
I crossed my fingers and toes that it would work.
translation.es: Crucé los dedos para que funcionara.

translation.en: It might've been a flop, but you didn't stop.
translation.es: Quizá no resultó,pero no te diste por vencido.

translation.en: You've got grit, B.
We didn't figure out how to teleport you home, but I have a theory.
translation.es: No te teletransportamos a casa,pero tengo una teoría.

translation.en: Maybe making new friends can cure your homesickness.
translation.es: Quizá tener nuevos amigos te ayude.

translation.en: Come on, watch Comet Quest with us.
translation.es: Mira En busca del cometa con nosotros.

translation.en: [all] "We don't rest until we quest!"
That was the business! 'Night, kids.
Another out-of-this-world episode! I'm gonna see what Dre thought. I found a way to stay close.
translation.es: Un gran episodio. A ver qué dice Dre.Ya sé cómo acotar la distancia.

translation.en: You were right. It was time for a new idea. Bam!
translation.es: Tenías razón. Era hora de otra idea.

translation.en: Ham radio!
I can use it to talk to Dre from anywhere.
translation.es: Así hablaré con Dre cuando quiera.

translation.en: The signal's so strong that you can even bounce it off of the moon.
translation.es: La señal es tan fuerteque llega hasta la luna.

translation.en: [Rosie] Fab-tastic!
Luckily, Dre doesn't live that far away.
translation.es: Por suerte, no vive tan lejos.

translation.en: Dre, it's me!
[Dre] B, can you believe Doctor Galactic finally made it to all the moons around Jupiter?
translation.es: ¿Puedes creer que por finrecorrió todas las lunas de Júpiter?

translation.en: Next level, right?
Say hi to my new friends, Ada, Iggy, and Rosie.
translation.es: Saluda a mis nuevos amigos:Ada, Pedro, y Rosa.

translation.en: -Howdy. -Hi.
-[Dre] Hey. -I miss you so much!
But at least we can talk all the time with this.
translation.es: Pero podremos hablar siempre con esto.

translation.en: Me too, but I'm glad you have new friends. I can't wait to meet them.
translation.es: Yo también. Me alegro por tus amigos.Quiero conocerlos.

translation.en: -Love you, cuz. -Love you, B.
Call you tomorrow. Aw! Your cousin seems awesome. Just like you.
translation.es: - Hablamos mañana.- Tu primo parece genial. Como tú.

translation.en: We're happy you're not an evil unicorn bot that loves music.
translation.es: Por suerte no eresun unicornio robot que adora la música.

translation.en: Huh! I'm definitely not.
But an evil, music-loving unicorn bot sounds wicked.
translation.es: Pero un unicornio robotque adora la música suena genial.

translation.en: Adding that to my list of ideas for comic book villains.
translation.es: Lo agregaréa mi lista de villanos de cómics.

translation.en: According to my calculations, this is gonna be the start of a beautiful friendship.
translation.es: Según mis cálculos,es el comienzo de una maravillosa amistad.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[all laugh]
